titleStmt.title: A treatise against the necessary dependance vpon that one head, and the present reconciliation to the Church of Rome Together with certaine sermons preached in publike assemblies, videlicet 1. The want of discipline. 2. The possession of a king. 3. The tumults of the people. 4. The mocke of reputation. 5. The necessitie of the Passion. 6. The wisdome of the rich. By Roger Fenton Doctor of Diuinitie, late preacher of Graies Inne.
titleStmt.author: Fenton, Roger, 1565-1616.
Utie, Emmanuel, d. 1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
